query: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.civil_id, COUNT(*) as test_count FROM patients p JOIN virology_tests vt ON p.id = vt.patient_id WHERE vt.viral_load IS NOT NULL AND vt.viral_load != '' GROUP BY p.id HAVING test_count >= 4 ORDER BY test_count DESC LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Toxohk3Dhi9dsc.27440a48dc26 --database n8MPugiTXDQnrheaaMVyV7 --execute SELECT p.id, p.name, p.civil_id, COUNT(*) as test_count FROM patients p JOIN virology_tests vt ON p.id = vt.patient_id WHERE vt.viral_load IS NOT NULL AND vt.viral_load != '' GROUP BY p.id HAVING test_count >= 4 ORDER BY test_count DESC LIMIT 5;
